title: 服务器一直显示xxx moved wrongly
txt_content:
服务器一直显示xxx moved wrongly
没有任何反作弊插件，但是一直显示同时玩家一直回弹怎么办
paperspigot 1.12.2

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
在spigot.yml内
设置
moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 20.0
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 1

因为spigot核心有一些反作弊功能

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
修改 spigot.yml 中的

  moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 10.0

replies.author: Foxm
replies.txt_content:
moved-wrongly-threshold: 
moved-too-quickly-threshold:
在spigot.yml里把这两项提高
